name: set_ritual_preferences
description: Save the user's personalized daily ritual template and voice selection after co-creating their preferences

parameters.description: When they prefer sessions. Must be exactly: morning_person or evening_person
Session length preference. Must be exactly: quick_focused or deeper_dive
Interaction style. Must be exactly: guided_structure or open_conversation
Selected voice type. Must be exactly: confident_coach, warm_friend, gentle_guide, or wise_mentor
Primary emotional focus. Must be exactly: stress_management, goal_achievement, relationships, self_worth, or emotional_regulation
